title: The Rescue
creator_credit: BBC Film Unit, Harry Govan and Gordon Mackay
brief_description: How two young climbers get into difficulties and are saved by the joint efforts of a Royal Air Force Mountain Rescue Team and other experienced climbers. Contrasts correct ways of mountain climbing with careless methods. Set in the mountains of Argyll and Inverness.
creator_credit_for_label: BBC Film Unit, Harry Govan and Gordon Mackay
